entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
